languages.text: {n}Джай, на которую, похоже, пространный рассказ Гордея также не производит особого впечатления, ловит взгляд Идиры и картинно закатывает глаза, заставляя псайкера хихикнуть.{/n}
{n}Jae, who looks just as unimpressed with Gordei's lengthy tale, catches Idira's gaze and rolls her eyes theatrically, making Idira snicker.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Джай, на которую, похоже, пространный рассказ Гордея также не производит особого впечатления, ловит взгляд Идиры и картинно закатывает глаза, заставляя псайкера хихикнуть.{/n}

languages.text: {n}同じくゴーディの長話に退屈しているらしいジェイは、イディラの視線を受け止めると、芝居がかかった様子で目を回してイディラを笑わせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae, who looks just as unimpressed with Gordei's lengthy tale, catches Idira's gaze and rolls her eyes theatrically, making Idira snicker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}同じくゴーディの長話に退屈しているらしいジェイは、イディラの視線を受け止めると、芝居がかかった様子で目を回してイディラを笑わせる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae, tout aussi assommée par le long récit de Gordei, croise le regard d'Idira et lève les yeux au ciel de façon théâtrale, provoquant un ricanement chez la psyker.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae, who looks just as unimpressed with Gordei's lengthy tale, catches Idira's gaze and rolls her eyes theatrically, making Idira snicker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, tout aussi assommée par le long récit de Gordei, croise le regard d'Idira et lève les yeux au ciel de façon théâtrale, provoquant un ricanement chez la psyker.{/n}

languages.text: {n}婕伊对戈尔代的长篇大论同样不以为然。她看到了伊迪拉的表情之后，夸张地翻了个白眼，惹得伊迪拉窃笑不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae, who looks just as unimpressed with Gordei's lengthy tale, catches Idira's gaze and rolls her eyes theatrically, making Idira snicker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊对戈尔代的长篇大论同样不以为然。她看到了伊迪拉的表情之后，夸张地翻了个白眼，惹得伊迪拉窃笑不已。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae, die Gordeis lange Geschichte anscheinend ebenso wenig beeindruckt hat, begegnet Idiras Blick und rollt theatralisch mit den Augen, woraufhin Idira kichert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae, who looks just as unimpressed with Gordei's lengthy tale, catches Idira's gaze and rolls her eyes theatrically, making Idira snicker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, die Gordeis lange Geschichte anscheinend ebenso wenig beeindruckt hat, begegnet Idiras Blick und rollt theatralisch mit den Augen, woraufhin Idira kichert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae, a quien también parece no importarle el extenso relato de Gordei, cruza la mirada con Idira y realiza un gesto teatral poniendo los ojos en blanco, provocando la risa de Idira.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae, who looks just as unimpressed with Gordei's lengthy tale, catches Idira's gaze and rolls her eyes theatrically, making Idira snicker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, a quien también parece no importarle el extenso relato de Gordei, cruza la mirada con Idira y realiza un gesto teatral poniendo los ojos en blanco, provocando la risa de Idira.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gorgei'nin uzun uzadıya anlattığı hikâyesinden bir o kadar etkilenmemiş duran Jae, İdira'yla göz göze geliyor ve abartılı bir şekilde gözlerini devirerek İdira'yı kıs kıs güldürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae, who looks just as unimpressed with Gordei's lengthy tale, catches Idira's gaze and rolls her eyes theatrically, making Idira snicker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gorgei uzun uzadıya anlattıkça bir o kadar etkilenmemiş gibi duran Jae, İdira'yla göz göze geliyor ve abartılı bir şekilde gözlerini devirerek İdira'nın kıs kıs gülmesini sağlıyor.{/n}
